name: SecuritiesPool
label: securities pool
definition: a pool of securities organized for the purpose of issuing notes against those securities

name: InstrumentPool
definition: pool consisting of financial instruments that may be included in the same investment vehicle
label: instrument pool

name: InstrumentPoolAsAsset
definition: financial asset in the form of an instrument pool
label: instrument pool as asset

name: Pool
definition: a combination of resources for a common purpose or benefit
label: pool

name: FundFamily
label: fund family
definition: a collection of managed investments that are all managed by a single investment institution

name: DebtPool
label: debt pool
definition: a pool consisting of debt instruments, such as bonds, loans or mortgages

name: PooledFund
label: pooled fund
definition: a pool of funds that a group of investors combines for common benefit

name: ManagedInvestment
label: managed investment
definition: investment pool that is controlled by a professional investment manager who invests the pool in various financial instruments and assets that align with their investment objectives and is overseen by a board of directors

name: SecuritiesPoolConstituent
definition: security that is included in a securities pool
label: securities pool constituent
explanatoryNote: This is a pool of any kind of security, and not therefore necessarily a pool of debt, though usually it is debt securities which are pooled.

name: PoolConstituent
label: pool constituent
explanatoryNote: The pool may be a pool of almost anything, brought together for some purpose. It differs from a less formal collection in that there are facts defined about the constituents and the proportions of these in the pool. Modeling note: A constituent of a pool may have facts which vary over time (such as balances) but the basic nature of the thing as a member of the pool remains the same, along with some facts which vary over time but which have a value as of the time they become members of the pool.
